00012 | Authors: Andi Tr√Ænculescu <andi@skyweb.ro>                            |
00013 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------+
00014 
00015 $Id: SAPageHandler.php 2 2006-06-12 19:59:25Z trinculescu $
00016 */
00017 
00022 final class SAPageHandler {
00023         private static $pageObjectCache;
00024         private static $app;
00025         
00031         public static function setApplicationObject(SApplication &$app) {
00032                 self::$app = &$app;
00033         }
00034         
00040         public static function handle($name) {
00041                 $page = null;
00042                 try {
00043                         $page = &self::tryToGetPage($name);
00044                 } catch (Exception $e) {
00045                         try {
00046                                 SALog::log($e->getMessage(), SA_LOG_WARNING);                           
00047                                 $page = &self::tryToGetPage(self::$app->getErrorPageName());
00048                         } catch (Exception $e) {
00049                                 SADebug::trace($e->getMessage(), __FILE__, __LINE__, __METHOD__);                               
00050                         }
00051                 }
00052                 if (is_null($page)) self::$app->resign("Could not create the page {$name}");
00053                 self::$app->setCurrentPage($page);
00054                 try {
00055                         $page->runEvents();
00056                         $page->display();
00057                 } catch (Exception $e) {
00058                         SADebug::trace($e->getMessage(), __FILE__, __LINE__, __METHOD__);
00059                 }
00060         }
00061         
00067         public static function &factory($name) {
00068                 if (is_a(self::$pageObjectCache[$name], 'SAIPage')) {
00069                         return self::$pageObjectCache[$name];
00070                 }
00071                 $page = null;
00072                 $pageFile = self::$app->getPageSearchDirectory() . "/{$name}.php";
00073                 $className = 'Page_' . str_replace('/', '_', $name);
00074                 if (file_exists($pageFile)) {
00075                         require_once($pageFile);
00076                         if (class_exists($className)) {
00077                                 $page = &new $className(self::$app, $name);
00078                                 if (!is_a($page, 'SAIPage')) {
00079                                         throw new DoesNotImplementSAIPageException("{$className} does not implement SAIPage");
00080                                 }
00081                                 self::$pageObjectCache[$name] = &$page;
00082                         } else {
00083                                 throw new Exception("The class {$className} was not found.");
00084                         }
00085                 } else {
00086                         throw new Exception("The file $pageFile was not found.");
00087                 }
00088                 
00089                 return $page;
00090         }
00091         
00097         private static function &tryToGetPage($name) {
00098                 $page = null;
00099                 try {
00100                         $page = &self::factory($name);
00101                 } catch (DoesNotImplementSAIPageException $e) {
00102                         SADebug::trace($e->getMessage(), __FILE__, __LINE__, __METHOD__);
00103                 } catch (Exception $e) {
00104                         throw new Exception($e->getMessage());
00105                 }
00106                 return $page;
00107         }
00108 }
